name: Speed Boats - Harbor Paradise Rush
description:
“Great Time Killer”
“Beautiful Graphics”
“Amazing music”
___________________________________

A new exciting game: Speed Boats! Control the blue and red formula boats at the same time and get the highest score. Each of the boat whirls along a two-lane channel.

Avoid bumping into the tubes and obstacles in the way, or the game will end. Try to get the highest score. Good luck!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Simple controls
Amazing graphics
High scores
Fascinating Game play
